name: Sedimentris
description:
Control your Tetris blocks of sediment to trap fish and plants and create fossils.

Fish will escape if you wait too long!

Controls:
  • Left and right arrow keys to control block
  • Up arrow to rotate
  • Down arrow to fast fall
By:
  • Kyle Johnston - Music & Sound
  • Ryan Wang - Art
  • Sophia Feesh - Art
  • Tanner Rogalsky - Code
